article_title: Congressional candidates Capps and Mitchum offer distinct differences
article_text: Incumbent Lois Capps, a Democrat, and challenger Chris Mitchum, a Republican, disagree on just about every issue. The one thing they have in common? They both want to win the 24th District seat to the U.S. Congress on Nov. 4.

article_summary:
Incumbent Lois Capps, a Democrat, and challenger Chris Mitchum, a Republican, disagree on just about every issue.
They both want to win the 24th District seat to the U.S. Congress on Nov. 4.
The one thing they have in common?
